item.title: 在美国关税协议达成之前，瑞士国内生产总值自 2023 年以来首次出现萎缩
item.description: 瑞士经济在第三季度出现了两年多来的首次萎缩，凸显了在美国官员上周达成贸易协议之前，美国超额关税所造成的影响。【原文：Switzerland’s economy contracted in the third quarter for the first time in more than two years, highlighting the impact outsized US tariffs had before officials secured a trade deal last week.】

item.title: 摩根大通称亚太地区科技交易积压量为历年之最
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Dealmaking is going to get even busier in technology, telecommunications and media in the Asia Pacific region next year, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co., building on the four-year high reached this year.】

item.title: 赣锋锂业董事长发表看涨预测后，中国锂市场飙升
item.description: 周一，在中国的一家主要生产商对电池材料作出看涨预测后，中国的锂价飙升。【原文：Lithium prices in China spiked on Monday after one of the country’s major producers gave a bullish forecast for the battery material.】

item.title: 南苏丹内阁批准将延迟的 2025-26 年预算提高 68
item.description: 南苏丹内阁部长批准了 7 万亿英镑（15 亿美元）的财政年度支出计划，该计划于 7 月开始执行，比上一财政年度多出约三分之二。【原文：South Sudan’s cabinet ministers approved a 7 trillion-pound ($1.5 billion) spending plan for the fiscal year that begun in July, which is about two thirds more than it passed for the previous period.】

item.title: Orlen 试图为欧洲增长最快的电动汽车市场快速充电
item.description: Orlen SA 以其庞大的红白相间加油站网络而闻名于整个东欧，随着其波兰本土市场成为欧洲大陆最新的电动汽车热点地区，该公司正加速向电动汽车充电站扩张。【原文：Orlen SA, known across eastern Europe for its vast network of red-and-white petrol stations, is accelerating expansion into charging points for electric vehicles as its home market in Poland becomes the continent’s latest hot spot for EVs.】

item.title: 海湾地区的 Arada 公司买下伦敦海滨地块，准备建造 5000 套住宅
item.description: 由沙特阿拉伯王子阿尔瓦利德-本-塔拉勒（Alwaleed bin Talal）的儿子和沙迦王室成员共同拥有的阿拉达开发公司（Arada Developments）收购了伦敦一个开发项目 80% 的股份，该项目计划至少增加 5000 套住房。【原文：Arada Developments, co-owned by the son of Saudi Arabian Prince Alwaleed bin Talal and a member of Sharjah’s royal family, has acquired an 80% stake in a London development that’s slated to add at least 5,000 homes.】

item.title: 波动后印度保险公司要求银行调整债券交易规范
item.description: 印度保险公司要求银行放宽债券衍生品交易的抵押规定，因为近期的剧烈波动迫使一些市场参与者预留了更多现金，造成流动性紧张。【原文：Indian insurance companies are asking banks to ease collateral rules for bond-derivative trades after recent bouts of volatility forced some market participants to set aside more cash, straining liquidity.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数在经历四月以来最差一天后有望延续跌势
Nigo 旗下街头服饰品牌 Human Made 在东京的首次公开募股定价为最高价
item.description: Human Made Inc.是一家日本街头服饰公司，由著名设计师 Nigo 创立，Nigo 也是 A Bathing Ape (BAPE) 时装系列的创始人。【原文：Human Made Inc., a Japanese streetwear firm founded by celebrity designer Nigo who also created the A Bathing Ape (BAPE) fashion line, priced its initial public offering at the top of the marketed range.】

item.title: Prosus 预计利润将因电子商务和腾讯增长而激增
item.description: Prosus NV 预计，由于其电子商务业务的增长和所持中国腾讯股份价值的增加，中期利润将激增。【原文：Prosus NV expects a surge in interim profit on the back of its growing e-commerce business and an increase in the value of the stake it owns in China’s Tencent.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利预计明年中国股市涨幅不大
item.description: 摩根士丹利认为，在企业盈利前景不明和估值偏高的情况下，中国股市明年可能进入盘整阶段。【原文：Chinese equities may enter a phase of consolidation next year amid an uncertain outlook for corporate earnings and high valuations, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 从 "掉头 "到 "让美国再次负担得起
item.description:
特朗普和英国工党政府都需要与撒切尔夫人的幽灵谈谈。【原文：

Both Trump and Britain’s Labour government need a word with the ghost of Margaret Thatcher.  

】

item.title: CATL 股价下跌，原因是股权出售和美国审查影响了市场情绪
item.description: 在美国立法者推动限制进口中国制造的电网组件之际，美国当代安培瑞斯科技公司（Amperex Technology Co.【原文：Shares in Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. fell after a major shareholder moved to cut his stake in the company, adding to worries about energy-storage systems as US lawmakers pushed to curb imports of Chinese-made grid components.】

item.title: 日本长期债券因财政担忧加剧而下滑
item.description: 日本较长期限的主权债券周一大幅下跌，原因是在政府预计最快于本周公布首个经济一揽子计划之前，财政问题再次引发担忧。【原文：Japan’s longer-maturity sovereign bonds fell sharply on Monday over renewed fiscal concerns ahead of the government’s first economic package expected to be unveiled as soon as this week.】

item.title: 日本总督将在核电站决策前访问福岛
item.description: 日本新泻县知事将于周二访问福岛核电站灾难现场，这是他决定是否批准在本地区重启一座独立核电站之前的一次重要访问。【原文：The governor of Japan’s Niigata Prefecture will visit the site of the Fukushima disaster on Tuesday, a key trip before he decides on whether to approve the restart of a separate nuclear plant in his own region.】

item.title: 现金补助不是解决全球贫困问题的长久之计
item.description:
直接现金赠款是提供全球发展援助的常用手段。但还有更好的方法来帮助穷人。【原文：

Direct cash grants are a popular means of providing global development aid. But there are better ways to help poor people.

】

item.title: 非洲的借贷成本为何最高
item.description:
一些领导人认为存在 "偏见溢价"。其他人则认为，违约风险和缺乏数据发挥了更大的作用。【原文：

Some leaders see a “prejudice premium.” Others say default risk and a lack of data play a bigger role.  

】

item.title: 石油交易商怀疑欧佩克+将在 2026 年削减供应量，尽管供应过剩
item.description: 石油交易商并不指望欧佩克+明年减产，尽管有预测称全球供应过剩可能会使油价进一步走低。【原文：Oil traders are not counting on OPEC+ to cut production next year, despite forecasts that a global supply surplus could send prices even lower.】

item.title: 投资者关注推迟发布的美国数据，新兴市场货币保持稳定
item.description: 新兴市场货币保持稳定，因为投资者在等待延迟发布的美国数据，这些数据将为美联储的利率轨迹提供线索。【原文：EM currencies steadied as investors awaited the release of delayed US data, which will give clues on the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate trajectory.】

item.title: 6000 亿美元暴跌后，比特币让华尔街的忠实拥趸感到惭愧
item.description: 比特币牛市拥有一切：华尔街的支持、政治的顺风、机构的现金。也就是说，除了反弹之外，什么都有。【原文：Bitcoin bulls have it all — Wall Street support, political tailwinds, institutional cash. Everything, that is, except a rally.】

item.title: Maeil 称韩国塑料制造商在整合方面取得进展
item.description: 据《Maeil Business Newspaper》报道，韩国两大塑料制造商正在敲定整合计划的细节，因为韩国石化行业正面临着中国的激烈竞争。【原文：South Korea’s two-biggest plastic makers are finalizing details on an integration plan, Maeil Business Newspaper reported, as the country’s petrochemical sector contends with intense Chinese competition.】

item.title: 印度首次公开募股热潮掩盖了投资者的不均衡回报
item.description: 印度的一级市场可能热闹非凡，但这并没有给投资者带来丰厚的回报。【原文：India’s primary market may be buzzing with activity, but that hasn’t translated into big rewards for investors.】

item.title: 印度和中国的购买为受供应短缺困扰的石油市场带来生机
item.description: 全球石油市场可能被对供应过剩的担忧所主导，但在美国对俄罗斯能源制裁浪潮的刺激下，生产商从中国和印度的购买中找到了一些支持。【原文：Global oil markets may be dominated by concerns about a glut, but producers have found some support in buying from China and India, spurred by a wave of US sanctions on Russian energy.】

item.title: 海外杠杆 ETF 引发的狂热为韩国人制定了新规则
item.description: 韩国散户投资者对海外上市的杠杆式交易所交易基金的贪婪，促使韩国监管机构收紧了对这些高风险产品购买者的规定。【原文：South Korean retail investors’ voracious appetite for leveraged exchange-traded funds listed overseas has prompted the nation’s regulators to tighten rules for buyers of these high-risk products.】

item.title: 韩国巨头承诺以创纪录的投资刺激国内增长
item.description: 韩国最大的企业集团已承诺在国内投资超过 5500 亿美元，此举意在表明，即使首尔与华盛顿的经济关系不断深化，韩国的工业引擎仍将牢牢扎根。【原文：South Korea’s biggest conglomerates have pledged to invest more than $550 billion at home, in a move meant to show that the country’s industrial engine will remain firmly rooted even as Seoul deepens economic ties with Washington.】

item.title: 非洲各国央行年底将迎来降息潮
item.description: 随着通货膨胀的缓解，一大波非洲国家的中央银行将在今年最后一次政策会议上降低利率，此举可能会重振经济增长。【原文：A wave of African central banks is set to cut interest rates at their final policy meetings of the year as inflation eases, a move that could reinvigorate economic growth.】

item.title: 野村将调查印度债券部是否虚增利润
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，野村控股公司正在调查其印度固定收益业务，要求其利率部门的高级官员确定近年来是否存在利润虚增的情况。【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. is investigating its India fixed-income business, asking senior officials in its rates division to determine whether profits were inflated in recent years, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: KKR 为钱德拉-阿斯利的埃索交易提供 7.5 亿美元融资
item.description: KKR & Co. 将为 Chandra Asri 集团提供 7.5 亿美元，用于收购埃克森美孚公司在新加坡的埃索品牌零售加油站。【原文：KKR & Co. is providing Chandra Asri Group with $750 million for its acquisition of Exxon Mobil Corp.’s Esso-branded retail fuel stations in Singapore.】

item.title: 在新五年计划的支持下，中国大力发展绿色氢能
item.description: 尽管绿色氢能在重排放行业的去碳化过程中发挥着核心作用，但该行业一直举步维艰，在中国政府发出继续支持绿色氢能的信号后，中国正在提高绿色氢能的产能。【原文：China is ramping up green hydrogen capacity after Beijing signaled its continued support for a sector that has struggled, despite its central role in decarbonizing emissions-heavy industries.】

item.title: 市场等待延迟的美国数据，金属走低
item.description: 基本金属走低，因为投资者在等待因政府关门而推迟发布的一系列美国经济数据。【原文：Base metals edged lower as investors waited for a bundle of US economic data that’s been delayed by the government shutdown.】
